title: Spherical representations of unitary groups at ramified places and the arithmetic inner product formula
summary: In this article, we study admissible representations of even unitary groups over local fields, where the quadratic extension is ramified, with invariant vectors under the action of the stabilizer of a unimodular lattice and some properties of the corresponding integral model of unitary Shimura varieties. As a direct application, we are able to improve the arithmetic inner product formula so that the places with local root number \((-1)\) are allowed to be ramified.

AI.tldr: 研究偶数阶酉群在局部域上的容许表示，其中二次扩张是分歧的，关注在幺模格稳定子作用下具有不变向量的表示，并研究相应酉Shimura簇积分模型的性质。
AI.motivation: 研究偶数阶酉群在局部域上的容许表示，特别是当二次扩张分歧时的情况，旨在理解在幺模格稳定子作用下具有不变向量的表示性质，以及相应的酉Shimura簇积分模型。
AI.method: 研究偶数阶酉群在局部域上的容许表示，其中二次扩张是分歧的，关注在幺模格稳定子作用下具有不变向量的表示，并分析相应酉Shimura簇积分模型的性质。
AI.result: 能够改进算术内积公式，使得局部根数为(-1)的位置可以允许是分歧的。
AI.conclusion: 通过对偶数阶酉群在局部域上的容许表示及其积分模型的研究，成功改进了算术内积公式，扩展了其适用范围，允许局部根数为(-1)的位置是分歧的。

title: Sheets, Jordan classes and induced orbits in the exotic and enhanced modules
summary:
Kato developed an exotic Deligne-Langlands correspondence using a geometric model for the multiparameter affine Hecke algebra of type C, based on his exotic nilpotent cone. Achar-Henderson and Springer showed that this exotic nilpotent is intimately related to another, apparently simpler variety called the enhanced nilpotent cone. Each of these is defined as the Hilbert nullcone of a polar module, the exotic Sp(2n)-module and the enhanced GL(n)-module, respectively.
  In this paper we conduct a detailed study of the geometry of these two modules, by introducing the Jordan stratification, simultaneously generalising classical results on the adjoint representation as well as the symmetric space associated to (gl(2n), sp(2n)). One of the key tools we develop is the theory of induced orbits in the enhanced and exotic nilpotent cones, following the work of Lusztig-Spaltenstein. Our main application is a classification of sheets in these modules, inspired by a theorem of Borho.

AI.tldr: 本文对增强和奇异幂零锥的几何结构进行了详细研究，引入了Jordan分层，并发展了诱导轨道理论，主要应用是分类这些模中的层。
AI.motivation: Kato基于奇异幂零锥建立了奇异Deligne-Langlands对应，而Achar-Henderson和Springer发现奇异幂零锥与增强幂零锥密切相关。本文旨在深入理解这两个模的几何结构，它们分别是奇异Sp(2n)-模和增强GL(n)-模的Hilbert零锥。
AI.method: 引入Jordan分层来同时推广伴随表示和对称空间(gl(2n), sp(2n))的经典结果。发展了增强和奇异幂零锥中的诱导轨道理论，遵循Lusztig-Spaltenstein的工作方法。
AI.result: 建立了增强和奇异幂零锥的几何结构理论，特别是发展了诱导轨道理论。主要应用是分类了这些模中的层，这受到Borho定理的启发。
AI.conclusion: 通过对奇异Sp(2n)-模和增强GL(n)-模的几何研究，本文为理解这些模的精细结构提供了系统框架，特别是通过Jordan分层和诱导轨道理论，最终实现了对这些模中层的完整分类。

title: Monomial bialgebras
summary: Starting from a single solution of QYBE (or CYBE) we produce an infinite family of solutions of QYBE (or CYBE) parametrized by transitive arrays and, in particular, by signed permutations. We are especially interested in cases when such solutions yield quasi-triangular structures on direct powers of Lie bialgebras and tensor powers of Hopf algebras. We obtain infinite families of such structures as well and study the corresponding Poisson-Lie structures and co-quasi-triangular algebras.

AI.tldr: 从单个QYBE/CYBE解出发，通过传递数组（特别是带符号排列）生成无限族QYBE/CYBE解，并应用于李双代数直幂和Hopf代数张量积的拟三角结构
AI.motivation: 研究如何从单个量子杨-巴克斯特方程（QYBE）或经典杨-巴克斯特方程（CYBE）解生成无限族解，并将这些解应用于构造李双代数的拟三角结构和Hopf代数的余拟三角结构
AI.method: 使用传递数组（特别是带符号排列）作为参数，从单个QYBE/CYBE解生成无限族解；将这些解应用于构造李双代数直幂的拟三角结构和Hopf代数张量积的余拟三角结构
AI.result: 获得了无限族的QYBE/CYBE解，以及相应的李双代数拟三角结构和Hopf代数余拟三角结构；研究了对应的泊松-李结构和余拟三角代数
AI.conclusion: 通过传递数组参数化方法，成功从单个解生成无限族QYBE/CYBE解，并应用于构造丰富的代数结构，为相关数学物理问题提供了系统的构造框架

title: New polar-finite forms of generalized Euler identities for $A_{1}^{(1)}$-string functions and mock theta conjecture-like identities
summary: Determining the explicit forms and modularity for string functions and branching coefficients for Kac--Moody algebras after Kac, Peterson, and Wakimoto is an important problem. For positive admissible-level string functions for the affine Kac--Moody algebra $A_{1}^{(1)}$, very little is known. Here we apply the notion of quasi-periodicity to a generalized Euler identity of Schilling and Warnaar for the affine Kac--Moody algebra $A_{1}^{(1)}$. For integral-level string functions the classical periodicity reduces the infinite sum of string functions in the generalized Euler identity to a finite sum of string functions with theta function coefficients. For admissible-level, we similarly reduce to an analogous finite sum of string functions, but we also gain an additional finite sum of the form \begin{equation*} \sum_{i}Φ_{i}(q)Ψ_{i}(q), \end{equation*} where the $Φ_i(q)$'s are modular and depend only on the spin and the $Ψ_{i}(q)$'s are (mixed) mock modular Hecke-type double-sums and depend only on the quantum number. For levels $1/2$, $1/3$, and $2/3$, we shall also see that the $Ψ_{i}(q)$'s give us families of mock theta conjecture-like identities for symmetric Hecke-type double-sums. Our work here focuses on evaluating the $Ψ_{i}(q)$'s, and our expressions utilize Ramanujan's second-order mock theta function $μ_2(q)$ and third-order mock theta functions $f_{3}(q)$, $ω_3(q)$, $ψ_{3}(q)$, and $χ_3(q)$.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了A1(1)仿射Kac-Moody代数的正可容许能级弦函数，通过拟周期性方法将广义欧拉恒等式简化为有限和，得到包含模形式和混合模拟模Hecke型二重和的表达式。
AI.motivation: 确定Kac-Moody代数的弦函数和分支系数的显式形式和模性是一个重要问题，但对于A1(1)仿射Kac-Moody代数的正可容许能级弦函数，目前了解甚少。
AI.method: 将拟周期性概念应用于Schilling和Warnaar的广义欧拉恒等式。对于可容许能级，将无限弦函数和简化为有限弦函数和，并得到一个包含模形式Φ_i(q)和混合模拟模Hecke型二重和Ψ_i(q)的附加有限和。
AI.result: 得到了弦函数的显式表达式，其中Ψ_i(q)在1/2、1/3和2/3能级下给出了对称Hecke型二重和的模拟theta猜想类恒等式族。表达式利用了Ramanujan的二阶模拟theta函数μ_2(q)和三阶模拟theta函数f_3(q)、ω_3(q)、ψ_3(q)、χ_3(q)。
AI.conclusion: 通过拟周期性方法成功处理了A1(1)仿射Kac-Moody代数的可容许能级弦函数问题，得到了包含模拟模函数的显式表达式，为相关数学物理问题提供了新工具。

title: Pro-p Iwahori Hecke algebras and the dual Vinberg monoid
summary: Let G be a split reductive group over the integers, F a p-adic local field with residue field Fq. We relate the pro-p-Iwahori Hecke algebra H of G(F) over Fq to the Vinberg monoid of the dual group and study this relation. As an application, in the GL(n)-case and for F/Qp unramified, we derive a parametrization of SpecZ by semisimple n-dimensional representations of the absolute Galois group of F, generalizing the known case n = 2. Here Z denotes the center of H.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了分裂约化群的pro-p-Iwahori Hecke代数与对偶群的Vinberg幺半群之间的关系，并在GL(n)情况下得到了Hecke代数中心与Galois表示参数化的对应关系。
AI.motivation: 研究分裂约化群在p-adic域上的pro-p-Iwahori Hecke代数与对偶群Vinberg幺半群之间的深层联系，旨在建立Hecke代数中心与Galois表示之间的参数化对应，推广已知的n=2情况。
AI.method: 通过建立分裂约化群在p-adic域上的pro-p-Iwahori Hecke代数与对偶群的Vinberg幺半群之间的代数关系，在GL(n)情况下且F/Qp非分歧时，推导出Hecke代数中心的谱与绝对Galois群的n维半单表示之间的参数化对应。
AI.result: 成功建立了pro-p-Iwahori Hecke代数与Vinberg幺半群的关系，并在GL(n)非分歧情况下得到了Hecke代数中心谱与n维半单Galois表示之间的参数化对应，推广了n=2的已知结果。
AI.conclusion: 该研究揭示了pro-p-Iwahori Hecke代数与对偶群Vinberg幺半群之间的深刻联系，为理解Hecke代数中心与Galois表示的关系提供了新的视角，特别是在GL(n)情况下建立了参数化对应，是Langlands纲领相关研究的重要进展。

title: Characteristic Classes Of Representations Of Lie Groups
summary: An irreducible representation of a reductive Lie algebra, when restricted to a Cartan subalgebra, decomposes into weights with multiplicity. The first part of this paper outlines a procedure to compute symmetric polynomials (e.g., power sums) of this multiset of weights, as functions of the highest weight. Next, let G be a connected reductive complex algebraic group with maximal torus T. We express the restrictions of the Chern classes of irreducible representations of G to T, as polynomial functions in the highest weight. We do the same for Stiefel-Whitney classes of orthogonal representations.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出计算李代数不可约表示权重对称多项式的方法，并表达约化代数群不可约表示的陈类和正交表示的Stiefel-Whitney类在极大环面上的限制
AI.motivation: 研究约化李代数不可约表示在Cartan子代数上的权重分解，以及约化代数群不可约表示的示性类在极大环面上的具体表达
AI.method: 第一部分提出计算权重多重集对称多项式（如幂和）的算法；第二部分将不可约表示的陈类和正交表示的Stiefel-Whitney类表达为最高权变量的多项式函数
AI.result: 建立了计算权重对称多项式的系统方法，得到了陈类和Stiefel-Whitney类在极大环面上的多项式表达式，这些表达式以最高权为变量
AI.conclusion: 该工作为约化李代数和代数群表示论中的权重分析和示性类计算提供了有效的算法和显式公式

title: Irreducible tensor product modules over the Takiff Lie algebra for $\mathfrak{sl}_{2}$
summary: In this paper, we construct a class of non-weight modules over the Takiff $\mathfrak{sl}_{2}$ by taking the tensor products of the irreducible free $U(\overline{\mathfrak{h}})$-modules of rank 1, where $\overline{\mathfrak{h}}$ is a natural Cartan subalgebra of the Takiff $\mathfrak{sl}_{2}$, with the irreducible highest weight modules. We characterize the irreducibility of these tensor product modules and determine the necessary and sufficient conditions for isomorphisms between them. We further prove that these non-weight modules are distinct from the known non-weight modules. Finally, we reformulate some tensor product modules over the Takiff $\mathfrak{sl}_{2}$ as induced modules derived from modules over certain subalgebras, and determine the necessary and sufficient conditions for the reducibility of these induced modules.

AI.tldr: 本文通过将Takiff 𝔰𝔩₂的秩1自由U(𝔥̅)-模与最高权模张量积，构造了一类非权模，研究了其不可约性、同构条件和与已知非权模的区别，并将部分张量积模重新表述为诱导模。
AI.motivation: 研究Takiff 𝔰𝔩₂代数的非权模结构，通过张量积构造新类型的非权模，扩展对该代数表示理论的理解。
AI.method: 将秩1的不可约自由U(𝔥̅)-模与不可约最高权模进行张量积，其中𝔥̅是Takiff 𝔰𝔩₂的自然Cartan子代数。分析这些张量积模的不可约性、同构条件，并与已知非权模比较。
AI.result: 1) 刻画了张量积模的不可约性条件；2) 确定了同构的充要条件；3) 证明了这些非权模与已知非权模不同；4) 将部分张量积模重新表述为诱导模，并确定了诱导模可约性的充要条件。
AI.conclusion: 成功构造了一类新的Takiff 𝔰𝔩₂非权模，系统研究了其表示性质，为Takiff代数的表示理论提供了新的模块构造方法和分类结果。

title: Triangle equivalences between Gorenstein tiled orders and incidence algebras of posets
summary: We prove that for any $\mathbb{N}$-graded Gorenstein tiled order $A$, the stable category $\underline{\mathrm{CM}}^{\mathbb{Z}}A$ is triangle equivalent to the perfect derived category of the incidence algebra of a finite poset $\mathbb{V}_A^{op}$. Moreover, for a finite poset $P$, we prove that the incidence algebra of $P$ can be realized as the endomorphism algebra of a standard tilting object if and only if $P$ is either empty or has the maximum. We also study the behaviors of the corresponding poset under graded Morita equivalences and coverings of a Gorenstein tiled order. Finally, we classify Gorenstein tiled orders $A$ satisfying $|\mathbb{V}_A^{op}|\leq 3$.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了对于任何N-分次Gorenstein平铺序A，稳定范畴CM^Z A与有限偏序集V_A^op的关联代数的完美导出范畴三角等价。同时研究了偏序集在分次Morita等价和平铺序覆盖下的行为，并分类了满足|V_A^op|≤3的Gorenstein平铺序。
AI.motivation: 研究Gorenstein平铺序的稳定范畴与偏序集关联代数之间的关系，建立这两种代数结构之间的对应关系，从而更好地理解Gorenstein平铺序的表示论性质。
AI.method: 使用同调代数方法，通过建立稳定范畴与完美导出范畴之间的三角等价关系。研究偏序集在分次Morita等价和覆盖下的行为，并通过对偏序集大小的限制来分类Gorenstein平铺序。
AI.result: 证明了对于任何N-分次Gorenstein平铺序A，稳定范畴CM^Z A与有限偏序集V_A^op的关联代数的完美导出范畴三角等价。确定了关联代数可以作为标准倾斜对象自同态代数的充要条件是该偏序集要么为空，要么有最大元。分类了满足|V_A^op|≤3的所有Gorenstein平铺序。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了Gorenstein平铺序的稳定范畴与偏序集关联代数之间的深刻联系，为理解这类代数结构的表示论性质提供了新的视角和工具，同时通过分类结果展示了这种对应关系的具体表现。

title: Auslander correspondence for truncated connective DG-algebras
summary: We establish a $d$-dimensional Auslander correspondence for $d$-truncated proper connective DG-algebras via $d$-extended module categories. A $d$-truncated proper connective DG-algebra $Γ$ is called Auslander if its $d$-extended module category is a $d$-Auslander extriangulated category. Our main theorem gives a one-to-one correspondence: for any $d$-truncated proper connective DG-algebra $Λ$ whose $d$-extended module category has finitely many indecomposable objects, the DG-endomorphism algebra of an additive generator is Auslander, and conversely every Auslander $d$-truncated proper connective DG-algebra arises in this way.

AI.tldr: 该论文建立了d维Auslander对应关系，通过d-扩张模范畴将d-截断真连通DG代数与d-Auslander外三角范畴联系起来。
AI.motivation: 研究d-截断真连通DG代数与d-Auslander外三角范畴之间的对应关系，扩展经典Auslander对应到更高维度和DG代数框架。
AI.method: 使用d-扩张模范畴作为桥梁，定义Auslander d-截断真连通DG代数（其d-扩张模范畴是d-Auslander外三角范畴），通过DG-自同态代数构造对应。
AI.result: 建立了双射对应：对于d-截断真连通DG代数Λ，若其d-扩张模范畴有有限个不可分解对象，则其加法生成子的DG-自同态代数是Auslander代数；反之每个Auslander d-截断真连通DG代数都以此方式获得。
AI.conclusion: 成功建立了d维Auslander对应，将经典Auslander-Reiten理论推广到d-截断真连通DG代数和d-Auslander外三角范畴的框架中。

title: Ordnung muss sein
comment: 5 papges. English translation of the title: "There must be order"
summary: For any length category, we establish a set of rules (necessary and sufficient) that ensure a partial order on the isomorphism classes of simple objects such that the category is equivalent to the category of finite dimensional representations of this partially ordered set.

AI.tldr: 该研究为任意长度范畴建立了一套规则，确保简单对象同构类上的偏序关系，使得该范畴等价于该偏序集上有限维表示的范畴。
AI.motivation: 研究范畴论中简单对象的结构，特别是建立范畴与偏序集表示范畴之间的等价关系，这有助于理解范畴的分类和表示理论。
AI.method: 为任意长度范畴建立了一套充分必要条件规则，确保简单对象同构类上存在偏序关系，使得范畴结构得以确定。
AI.result: 证明了在满足这些规则的条件下，该范畴等价于相应偏序集上有限维表示的范畴，建立了范畴分类的完整理论框架。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为长度范畴的分类提供了完整的理论工具，建立了范畴与偏序集表示范畴之间的等价关系，深化了对范畴结构和表示理论的理解。

title: A new new coproduct on quantum loop algebras
summary: Quantum loop algebras generalize $U_q(\widehat{\mathfrak{g}})$ for simple Lie algebras $\mathfrak{g}$, and they include examples such as quantum affinizations of Kac-Moody Lie algebras, K-theoretic Hall algebras of quivers, and BPS algebras for toric Calabi-Yau threefolds. In the present paper, we define a coproduct on general quantum loop algebras, which coincides with the Drinfeld-Jimbo coproduct in the particular case of $U_q(\widehat{\mathfrak{g}})$ . We investigate the consequences of our construction for the representation theory of quantum loop algebras, particularly for tensor products of modules and R-matrices.

AI.tldr: 本文为一般量子环代数定义了余积结构，该结构在U_q(𝔤̂)的特殊情况下与Drinfeld-Jimbo余积一致，并研究了其对量子环代数表示论的影响
AI.motivation: 量子环代数推广了简单李代数𝔤的U_q(𝔤̂)，包括Kac-Moody李代数的量子仿射化、箭图的K理论Hall代数、以及环面Calabi-Yau三维流形的BPS代数等例子。目前缺乏对这些一般量子环代数的余积结构定义
AI.method: 为一般量子环代数定义了一个余积结构，该结构在U_q(𝔤̂)的特殊情况下与Drinfeld-Jimbo余积一致
AI.result: 成功定义了适用于一般量子环代数的余积结构，并研究了该构造对量子环代数表示论的影响，特别是对模的张量积和R矩阵的影响
AI.conclusion: 为一般量子环代数建立的余积结构框架为研究其表示论提供了基础，特别是在模的张量积和R矩阵方面，这将有助于进一步探索量子环代数的代数结构和物理应用

title: Lecture notes on Nichols algebras
summary: These are lecture notes for an introductory course on Nichols algebras. As a main reference, I work with the book by Heckenberger and Schneider, but I want to take a distinct categorical perspective and try to develop the topic for an audience without a background in Hopf algebras. On the other hand I put some emphasis on hands-on examples. My first goal is to explain the definitions and the striking properties of Nichols algebras, foremost the odd reflection theory that is already present in Lie superalgebras. My second goal is to explain how the category of representations of a quantum group can be constructed, using categorical tools, from the Nichols algebra as its centerpiece. This makes the zoo of different existing versions of quantum groups more transparent and allows the construction of many more non-semisimple modular tensor categories. Other topics include different types of examples beyond the diagonal case, categorical versions of some Hopf algebra constructions, and an outlook section on the appearance of Nichols algebras in conformal field theory.

AI.tldr: 这是一篇关于Nichols代数的入门课程讲义，采用范畴论视角，面向没有Hopf代数背景的读者，强调实际例子，并探讨Nichols代数在量子群表示论和共形场论中的应用。
AI.motivation: 为没有Hopf代数背景的读者提供Nichols代数的入门介绍，采用不同于传统方法的范畴论视角，强调实际例子和具体应用，使这一抽象数学概念更加直观易懂。
AI.method: 以Heckenberger和Schneider的著作为主要参考，但采用独特的范畴论视角；强调动手实例；首先解释Nichols代数的定义和奇特性质（特别是奇反射理论），然后展示如何以Nichols代数为核心，使用范畴工具构建量子群的表示范畴。
AI.result: 讲义提供了Nichols代数的系统介绍，使不同版本的量子群结构更加透明，并允许构建更多非半单模张量范畴；涵盖了对角情况之外的不同类型例子，以及Hopf代数构造的范畴版本。
AI.conclusion: Nichols代数作为量子群表示范畴的核心构件，通过范畴论方法可以更清晰地理解其结构；这些代数在共形场论中也有重要应用，为构建非半单模张量范畴提供了有力工具。

title: The singular Hitchin fibration, cameral data, and representation theory
summary:
For a complex reductive group $G$, we consider the locus $M^d$ in the moduli stack of $G$-Higgs bundles on which the centraliser dimension of the Higgs field takes a constant value $d> rk(G)$. We describe a non-abelian structure for the Hitchin fibration on $M^d$, under mild conditions on the geometry of the centraliser level set $\mathfrak{g}_d$ in the Lie algebra. If $G$ is a classical group, we also show that the restriction of the Hitchin map to the locus of generically semisimple Higgs bundles in $M^d$ factors through an abelian fibration. The abelianised fibres can be described using a generalisation of the cameral data of Donagi and Gaitsgory.
  We apply these constructions to $G_\mathbb{R}$-Hitchin fibrations for real forms $G_\mathbb{R}$. In particular we give a cameral description for an abelianisation of the $G_\mathbb{R}$-Hitchin fibration, which extends the known description in the quasi-split case. We determine this explicitly in the examples $G_\mathbb{R} = SU(p,q)$ and $G_{\mathbb{R}} = SO^*(4m+2)$. Our local results also give a connection between the geometry of the Hitchin fibration on $M^d$ and the representation theory of the Lie algebra $\mathfrak{g}$, via the orbit method. As a corollary, we determine an explicit asymptotic relationship between two notions of multiplicity, one attached to an adjoint orbit in $\mathfrak{g}$ and one attached to a primitive ideal of the universal enveloping algebra of $\mathfrak{g}$.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了复约化群G的Higgs丛模空间上中心化子维数为常数d>rk(G)的轨迹M^d，描述了该轨迹上Hitchin纤维化的非阿贝尔结构，并应用于实形式G_ℝ的Hitchin纤维化。
AI.motivation: 研究Higgs丛模空间中具有特定中心化子维数的轨迹的几何结构，特别是Hitchin纤维化在这些轨迹上的行为，并将其应用于实形式的情况。
AI.method: 在中心化子水平集𝔤_d满足温和几何条件的前提下，描述M^d上Hitchin纤维化的非阿贝尔结构；对于经典群，限制在一般半单Higgs丛轨迹上的Hitchin映射通过阿贝尔纤维化分解；使用Donagi和Gaitsgory的cameral数据的推广来描述阿贝尔化纤维。
AI.result: 对于经典群，限制在一般半单Higgs丛轨迹上的Hitchin映射可通过阿贝尔纤维化分解；将构造应用于实形式G_ℝ的Hitchin纤维化，给出了G_ℝ-Hitchin纤维化阿贝尔化的cameral描述，并在SU(p,q)和SO^*(4m+2)等例子中具体确定；建立了M^d上Hitchin纤维化几何与李代数𝔤表示理论之间的联系。
AI.conclusion: 该研究揭示了具有特定中心化子维数的Higgs丛轨迹上Hitchin纤维化的几何结构，建立了与表示理论的联系，并为实形式的情况提供了统一的描述框架，扩展了准分裂情况下的已知结果。

title: Eigenweights for arithmetic Hirzebruch Proportionality
comment: Fix broken reference, clarify some phrasing
summary: Prior work of Feng--Yun--Zhang established a (Higher) Arithmetic Hirzebruch Proportionality Principle, expressing the arithmetic volumes of moduli stacks of shtukas in terms of differential operators applied to $L$-functions. This formula involves certain "eigenweights" which were calculated in simple cases by Feng--Yun--Zhang, but not in general. We document work of a (custom) AI Agent built upon Gemini Deep Think, which employs tools from algebraic combinatorics to connect these eigenweights to the representation theory of symmetric groups, and then determines them for all classical groups.

AI.tldr: 本文开发了一个基于Gemini Deep Think的定制AI代理，使用代数组合学工具将模空间shtukas的算术体积公式中的"特征权重"与对称群的表示理论联系起来，并计算了所有经典群的特征权重。
AI.motivation: Feng-Yun-Zhang先前建立了算术Hirzebruch比例原理，用$L$函数的微分算子表示模空间shtukas的算术体积，但公式中的"特征权重"只在简单情况下被计算，一般情况尚未解决。
AI.method: 构建基于Gemini Deep Think的定制AI代理，利用代数组合学工具，将特征权重与对称群的表示理论建立联系，然后计算所有经典群的特征权重。
AI.result: 成功将特征权重与对称群的表示理论联系起来，并确定了所有经典群的特征权重，解决了先前工作中未解决的一般情况。
AI.conclusion: 通过AI代理和代数组合学方法，成功计算了算术Hirzebruch比例原理中所有经典群的特征权重，完善了该理论框架。

title: Massless Representations in Conformal Space and Their de Sitter (dS) Restrictions
summary: The monograph develops a self-contained, mathematically rigorous framework for massless representations of the conformal group U(2,2) and their restriction to the de Sitter group Sp(2,2). It systematically constructs ladder (massless) representations, computes invariant bilinear forms and Casimir operators, and provides explicit constructions of vertex operators and two-point functions for low-helicity fields. The monograph employs a novel Clifford-split-octonion approach, embedding 8-component Majorana spinors within an alternative composition algebra, which allows for fully explicit algebraic, spinorial, and geometric constructions. The text bridges foundational representation theory, explicit computational methods, and physical applications in quantum field theory and cosmology. While targeted at researchers in mathematical physics, quantum cosmology, and quantum field theory, the exposition is pedagogically structured to guide advanced graduate students through subtle algebraic and representation-theoretic ideas, making complex constructions accessible without sacrificing rigor.

AI.tldr: 该专著为U(2,2)共形群的无质量表示及其到de Sitter群Sp(2,2)的限制建立了自包含的数学严格框架，采用新颖的Clifford-分裂八元数方法构建顶点算子和两点函数。
AI.motivation: 为共形群的无质量表示和de Sitter群限制提供系统、严格的数学框架，连接基础表示理论、显式计算方法和量子场论及宇宙学中的物理应用。
AI.method: 采用新颖的Clifford-分裂八元数方法，将8分量Majorana旋量嵌入到替代合成代数中，系统构建阶梯（无质量）表示，计算不变双线性形式和Casimir算子，显式构造低螺旋度场的顶点算子和两点函数。
AI.result: 建立了完整的数学框架，实现了无质量表示的显式代数、旋量和几何构造，为量子场论和宇宙学应用提供了严格基础。
AI.conclusion: 该专著成功构建了连接基础表示理论、显式计算方法和物理应用的桥梁，既保持了数学严谨性，又通过教学式结构使复杂构造对高级研究生可理解。

title: Higher Verlinde categories of reductive groups
comment: 25 pages, 1 figure. v2: expanded Theorem 3(1) and Conjecture 3.8
summary: We define tensor categories ${\sf Ver}_{p^n}(G)$ in characteristic $p$ for connected reductive groups $G$ and positive integers $n$, generalising the semisimple Verlinde categories ${\sf Ver}_p(G)$ originating from Gelfand-Kazhdan and the higher Verlinde categories ${\sf Ver}_{p^n}$ for ${\rm SL}_2$ defined by Benson-Etingof-Ostrik. The construction is based on the definition of ${\sf Ver}_{p^n}$ as an abelian envelope of a quotient of a category of tilting modules, but we also introduce an expanded construction which refines the ${\rm SL}_2$ case and gives new results. In particular, the union ${\sf Ver}_{p^\infty}(G)$ can be derived from the perfection of $G$; certain exact sequences in ${\sf Rep}G$ map to exact sequences in ${\sf Ver}_{p^n}(G)$; and the underlying abelian category of ${\sf Ver}_{p^n}$ can be expressed as a subcategory of ${\sf Rep}{\rm SL}_2$, or as a Serre quotient of a subcategory of ${\sf Rep}{\rm SL}_2$.

AI.tldr: 在特征p下为连通约化群G和正整数n定义张量范畴Ver_{p^n}(G)，推广了Gelfand-Kazhdan的半单Verlinde范畴Ver_p(G)和Benson-Etingof-Ostrik为SL_2定义的高阶Verlinde范畴Ver_{p^n}。
AI.motivation: 将Verlinde范畴从半单情况推广到更一般的情形，为连通约化群G构造高阶Verlinde范畴，统一并扩展已有的理论框架。
AI.method: 基于tilting模范畴的商范畴的abelian包络定义Ver_{p^n}(G)，同时引入扩展构造来细化SL_2情况。构造涉及从RepG到Ver_{p^n}(G)的精确序列映射，以及将Ver_{p^n}的abelian范畴表示为Rep SL_2的子范畴或子范畴的Serre商。
AI.result: 成功定义了Ver_{p^n}(G)范畴；证明了Ver_{p^∞}(G)可以从G的完美化导出；建立了RepG中精确序列到Ver_{p^n}(G)中精确序列的映射；给出了Ver_{p^n}的abelian范畴在Rep SL_2中的两种表示方式。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为特征p下的表示理论提供了新的范畴框架，统一了不同维度的Verlinde范畴构造，并为研究连通约化群的高阶表示理论奠定了基础。

title: Restriction of the metaplectic representation over a $p$-adic field to an anisotropic torus
summary:
In this article, we examine the restriction of the metaplectic representation $π$ over a $p$-adic field $k$, $p\neq2$, of zero characteristic to an isotropic torus $S$ contained in the symplectic group. First we give necessary and sufficient conditions on the momentum map in order that $S$ be admissible, that is $π_{\vert S}$ decomposes with finite multiplicities.
  Let us say that a torus contained in the symplectic group is irreducible if its action on the symplectic space is irreducible over $k$. Then we examine the case when $S$ is a proper subtorus of a maximal irreducible torus $T$ in the symplectic group and give sufficient conditions on $T$ in order that $S$ never be admissible. When these conditions are not satisfied, we give examples of admissible proper tori of a maximal irreducible torus.
  Finally, for any admissible subtorus $S$ of a certain type of maximal irreducible torus, we compute the multiplicity of the unitary characters of $S$ appearing into $π_{\vert S}$. We also show that the multiplicity of such a character is equal to the volume of the symplectic reduction of the inverse image under the momentum map of a linear form associated to it.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究p-adic域上辛群中迷向环面在metalectic表示下的限制，分析环面的可容许性条件，并计算表示分解中酉特征标的多重性。
AI.motivation: 研究p-adic域上辛群中迷向环面在metalectic表示下的限制问题，探讨环面何时可容许（即表示限制具有有限多重性分解），并计算特征标的多重性。
AI.method: 首先给出动量映射的条件来确定环面可容许性的充要条件；然后研究最大不可约环面的真子环面，给出不可容许的充分条件；最后对特定类型的最大不可约环面的可容许子环面，计算酉特征标的多重性。
AI.result: 建立了环面可容许性的充要条件；给出了最大不可约环面真子环面不可容许的充分条件；计算了可容许子环面酉特征标的多重性，并证明该多重性等于动量映射逆像的辛约化体积。
AI.conclusion: 该研究系统分析了p-adic域上辛群中迷向环面在metalectic表示下的限制问题，建立了可容许性的判别条件，并给出了多重性的几何解释，为相关表示论研究提供了理论基础。

title: Calabi-Yau structures on derived and singularity categories of symmetric orders
comment: 20 pages; v2: Theorem A extended to the Hochschild homology with coefficients setting (similar proof)
summary: We construct left and right Calabi-Yau structures on derived respectively singularity categories of symmetric orders $Λ$ over commutative Gorenstein rings $R$. For this, we first construct Calabi-Yau structures over $R$ by lifting Amiot's construction of Calabi-Yau structures on Verdier quotients to the dg level. Then we prove base change properties relating Calabi-Yau structures over $R$ to those over the base field $k$. As a result, we prove the existence of a right Calabi-Yau structure on the dg singularity category associated with $Λ$ which is a cyclic lift of the weak Calabi-Yau structure constructed by the first-named author and Iyama. We also show the existence of a left Calabi-Yau structure on the dg bounded derived category of $Λ$. This is a non-commutative generalization of a result by Brav and Dyckerhoff. By combining the existence of the right Calabi-Yau structure on the dg singularity category with a structure theorem by Keller and the second-named author, we deduce that under suitable hypotheses, the singularity category associated with $Λ$ is triangle equivalent to a generalized cluster category in the sense of Amiot.

AI.tldr: 该论文在对称序Λ的导出范畴和奇点范畴上构造了左右Calabi-Yau结构，推广了非交换几何中的Calabi-Yau理论，并建立了与广义簇范畴的三角等价关系。
AI.motivation: 研究对称序Λ在交换Gorenstein环R上的Calabi-Yau结构，旨在将Amiot在Verdier商上的Calabi-Yau构造提升到dg层面，并建立与基域k的基变换性质，从而推广非交换几何中的相关结果。
AI.method: 首先在R上构造Calabi-Yau结构，通过将Amiot的Verdier商Calabi-Yau构造提升到dg层面；然后证明Calabi-Yau结构在R和基域k之间的基变换性质；最后结合Keller等人的结构定理，建立奇点范畴与广义簇范畴的等价关系。
AI.result: 证明了在dg奇点范畴上存在右Calabi-Yau结构（是已有弱Calabi-Yau结构的循环提升），在dg有界导出范畴上存在左Calabi-Yau结构；在适当假设下，Λ的奇点范畴三角等价于Amiot意义上的广义簇范畴。
AI.conclusion: 该工作成功构造了对称序Λ的导出范畴和奇点范畴上的左右Calabi-Yau结构，建立了与基变换相关的性质，并将奇点范畴与广义簇范畴联系起来，为非交换Calabi-Yau几何提供了重要工具。

title: Some incarnations of Hamiltonian reduction in symplectic geometry and geometric representation theory
summary: In this expository note, we give a self-contained introduction to some modern incarnations of Hamiltonian reduction. Particular emphasis is placed on applications to symplectic geometry and geometric representation theory. We thereby discuss abelianization in Hamiltonian geometry, reduction by symplectic groupoids, and the Moore--Tachikawa conjecture.

AI.tldr: 这是一篇关于哈密顿约化的现代形式及其在辛几何和几何表示论中应用的综述性文章。
AI.motivation: 介绍哈密顿约化的现代形式，为读者提供自包含的入门材料，特别关注其在辛几何和几何表示论中的应用。
AI.method: 采用综述性方法，系统介绍哈密顿约化的现代形式，包括哈密顿几何中的阿贝尔化、辛群胚约化以及Moore-Tachikawa猜想。
AI.result: 提供了哈密顿约化现代形式的自包含介绍，建立了辛几何、几何表示论与哈密顿约化之间的联系框架。
AI.conclusion: 哈密顿约化的现代形式为辛几何和几何表示论提供了重要的理论工具和研究视角，Moore-Tachikawa猜想代表了该领域的重要发展方向。

title: Fusion systems related to polynomial representations of $\mathrm{SL}_2(q)$
summary: Let $q$ be a power of a fixed prime $p$. We classify up to isomorphism all simple saturated fusion systems on a certain class of $p$-groups constructed from the polynomial representations of $\mathrm{SL}_2(q)$, which includes the Sylow $p$-subgroups of $\mathrm{GL}_3(q)$ and $\mathrm{Sp}_4(q)$ as special cases. The resulting list includes all Clelland--Parker fusion systems, a simple exotic fusion system discovered by Henke--Shpectorov, and a new infinite family of exotic examples.

AI.tldr: 该论文对一类由SL₂(q)多项式表示构造的p群上的饱和融合系统进行了完全分类，发现了新的无限族外来融合系统。
AI.motivation: 研究特定p群上的饱和融合系统分类问题，这类群包括GL₃(q)和Sp₄(q)的Sylow p-子群，旨在发现新的融合系统结构。
AI.method: 利用SL₂(q)的多项式表示构造一类p群，然后对这些群上的所有简单饱和融合系统进行同构分类。
AI.result: 分类结果包括：所有Clelland-Parker融合系统、Henke-Shpectorov发现的一个简单外来融合系统，以及一个新的无限族外来融合系统。
AI.conclusion: 成功分类了一类重要p群上的所有简单饱和融合系统，发现了新的无限族外来融合系统，扩展了对融合系统结构的理解。

title: Center of generalized skein algebras
summary: We consider a generalization of the Kauffman bracket skein algebra of a surface that is generated by loops and arcs between marked points on the interior or boundary, up to skein relations defined by Muller and Roger-Yang. We compute the center of this Muller-Roger-Yang skein algebra and show that it is almost Azumaya when the quantum parameter $q$ is a primitive $n$-th root of unity with odd $n$. We also discuss the implications on the representation theory of the Muller-Roger-Yang generalized skein algebra.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了Muller-Roger-Yang广义结代数，计算了其中心，并证明了当量子参数q为奇数次本原单位根时，该代数几乎Azumaya。
AI.motivation: 研究Muller-Roger-Yang广义结代数的代数结构，特别是其中心性质，以理解该代数的表示理论。
AI.method: 通过将Muller-Roger-Yang广义结代数视为Kauffman括号结代数的推广，使用代数几何和量子群方法计算该代数的中心。
AI.result: 计算出了Muller-Roger-Yang广义结代数的中心，并证明当量子参数q为奇数次本原单位根时，该代数几乎Azumaya。
AI.conclusion: Muller-Roger-Yang广义结代数在量子参数为奇数次本原单位根时具有几乎Azumaya性质，这对该代数的表示理论有重要影响。

title: Interval Multiplicities of Persistence Modules
summary: For any persistence module $M$ over a finite poset $\mathbf{P}$, and any interval $I$ of $\mathbf{P}$, we give a formula of the multiplicity $d_M(V_I)$ of the interval module $V_I$ in the indecomposable decomposition of $M$ in terms of the ranks of matrices consisting of structure linear maps of the module $M$, which gives a generalization of the corresponding formula for 1-dimensional persistence modules. As an easy application, the formula enables us to compute the maximal interval-decomposable direct summand of $M$, which gives us a way to decide whether $M$ is interval-decomposable or not. In addition, when a set $V_{I_1}, \dots, V_{I_n}$ of interval direct summands of $M$ gives a specific property of $M$, we can study this property by directly computing the multiplicities $d_M(V_{I_i})$ by our formula without decomposing $M$. Moreover, the formula tells us which morphisms of $\mathbf{P}$ are essential to compute the multiplicity $d_M(V_I)$. This suggests us some order-preserving map $ζ\colon Z \to \mathbf{P}$ such that the induced restriction functor $R \colon \operatorname{mod} \mathbf{P} \to \operatorname{mod} Z$ has the property that the multiplicity $d:= d_{R(M)}(R(V_I))$ is equal to $d_M(V_I)$. In this case, we say that $ζ$ essentially covers $I$. If $Z$ can be taken as a poset of Dynkin type $\mathbb{A}$, also known as a zigzag poset, then the calculation of the multiplicity $d$ can be done more efficiently, starting from the filtration level of topological spaces. Thus this even makes it unnecessary to compute the structure linear maps of $M$. Finally, we also give a formula of $d_M(V_I)$ in terms of a projective presentation of $M$ rather than its structure linear maps. In the 2D-grid case, this formula is more practical because in that case projective resolutions of $M$ can be computed from the filtration level of topological spaces.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一个计算有限偏序集上持久性模中区间模重数的通用公式，推广了一维持久性模的情况，并提供了多种应用场景。
AI.motivation: 研究持久性模的分解结构是拓扑数据分析中的核心问题。现有方法主要针对一维情况，对于更一般的有限偏序集上的持久性模，缺乏计算区间模重数的有效公式。本文旨在填补这一空白，为更复杂的持久性模分析提供理论基础和实用工具。
AI.method: 通过结构线性映射的矩阵秩来推导区间模重数的计算公式。该方法基于持久性模的结构线性映射构建矩阵，通过计算这些矩阵的秩差来获得重数。同时探讨了通过诱导限制函子简化计算的方法，特别是在Dynkin类型A（zigzag）偏序集上的高效计算。
AI.result: 成功推导出有限偏序集上任意持久性模中区间模重数的通用计算公式。该公式能够：1）计算最大区间可分解直和项；2）判断模是否区间可分解；3）无需完全分解模即可计算特定区间模的重数。此外，还提出了通过投影表示计算重数的替代公式。
AI.conclusion: 本文提出的公式为有限偏序集上持久性模的分解分析提供了强有力的工具，不仅推广了一维情况的结果，还提供了多种实用应用。通过引入"本质覆盖"概念和利用zigzag偏序集的特性，进一步简化了计算过程，使得从拓扑空间过滤层次直接计算成为可能。

title: Three homological invariants under cleft extensions
comment: To appear in the Journal of Algebra
summary: In this paper, we investigate the behavior of Igusa-Todorov distances, extension and Rouquier dimensions under cleft extensions of abelian categories. We apply our results to Morita context rings, trivial extension rings, tensor rings and arrow removals.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了Igusa-Todorov距离、扩展维度和Rouquier维度在阿贝尔范畴的cleft扩展下的行为，并将结果应用于Morita上下文环、平凡扩张环、张量环和箭头移除等代数结构。
AI.motivation: 研究代数结构中的维度理论在各种范畴扩展下的行为，特别是理解Igusa-Todorov距离、扩展维度和Rouquier维度这些重要同调不变量在范畴构造中的变化规律。
AI.method: 通过分析阿贝尔范畴的cleft扩展，建立维度理论在这些扩展下的性质，然后将理论结果应用于具体的代数结构：Morita上下文环、平凡扩张环、张量环和箭头移除操作。
AI.result: 获得了Igusa-Todorov距离、扩展维度和Rouquier维度在cleft扩展下的具体行为规律，并推导出这些维度在Morita上下文环、平凡扩张环、张量环和箭头移除等具体代数结构中的性质。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了同调维度理论在范畴扩展中的系统性框架，为理解代数结构中的维度不变量在各种构造下的行为提供了理论基础，并展示了在多种具体代数场景中的应用价值。

title: Borel-Weil factorization for super Grassmannians
summary: This article deals with computing the cohomology of Schur functors applied to tautological bundles on super Grassmannians. We show that in a range of cases, the cohomology is a free module over the cohomology of the structure sheaf and that the space of generators is an irreducible representation of the general linear supergroup that can be constructed via explicit multilinear operations. Our techniques come from commutative algebra: we relate this cohomology calculation to Tor groups of certain algebraic varieties.

AI.tldr: 计算超格拉斯曼流形上tautological丛的Schur函子同调，证明在一定范围内同调是结构层同调的自由模，生成元空间是超一般线性群的不可约表示
AI.motivation: 研究超格拉斯曼流形上tautological丛的Schur函子同调性质，探索超对称几何中的表示论结构
AI.method: 使用交换代数技术，将同调计算与某些代数簇的Tor群联系起来
AI.result: 在一定范围内，同调是结构层同调的自由模，生成元空间是超一般线性群的不可约表示，可通过显式多重线性运算构造
AI.conclusion: 建立了超格拉斯曼流形上tautological丛的Schur函子同调与交换代数中Tor群的联系，揭示了其表示论结构

title: Categories of Line Defects and Cohomological Hall Algebras
comment: 82 pages; v2: references added, typos corrected, main conjecture reinforced with results on Schur indices and O^*-equivariance; v3: conjecture for spherical CoHAs refined
summary: Any four-dimensional Supersymmetric Quantum Field Theory with eight supercharges can be associated to a monoidal category of BPS line defects. Any Coulomb vacuum of such a theory can be conjecturally associated to an ``algebra of BPS particles'', exemplified by certain Cohomological Hall Algebras. We conjecture the existence of a monoidal functor from the category of line defects to a certain category of bimodules for the BPS Algebra in any Coulomb vacuum. We describe images of simple objects under the conjectural functor and study their monoidal structure in examples. We conjecture that the functor may be an equivalence of dg-categories and test the conjecture at the level of the equivariant Witten indices of the spaces of morphisms.

AI.tldr: 四维超对称量子场论中的BPS线缺陷范畴与Coulomb真空中的BPS粒子代数之间存在猜想性的单子函子关系
AI.motivation: 探索具有八个超荷的四维超对称量子场论中BPS线缺陷范畴与Coulomb真空中BPS粒子代数之间的深层数学联系
AI.method: 提出存在从线缺陷范畴到BPS代数双模范畴的单子函子的猜想，描述简单对象在该函子下的像，并通过例子研究其单子结构
AI.result: 建立了线缺陷范畴与BPS代数双模范畴之间的猜想性对应关系，并在等变Witten指标层面验证了函子可能是dg-范畴等价
AI.conclusion: 四维超对称量子场论中的BPS线缺陷范畴与Coulomb真空中的BPS粒子代数之间可能存在深刻的范畴等价关系，这为理解超对称场论的结构提供了新的数学框架

title: Quasi-integrable modules over affine Lie superalgebras (Critical level)
comment: The new manuscript version is 25 pages long. This version enhances the main theorem by providing a complete characterization of the relevant modules via parabolic inductions. This advancement resolves a previously uncovered case from earlier drafts. All typographical errors have also been corrected
summary: Representation theory of Lie (super)algebras has attracted significant research interest for many years, especially due to its applications in theoretical physics; in this regard, the representation theory of affine Lie (super)algebras is of central importance. To characterize simple modules over affine Lie (super)algebras, it is necessary to study the cases of nonzero and critical levels separately. Although a vast amount of research has been done on the representation theory of affine Lie (super)algebras $\LL$, investigations concerning general modules at the critical level remain limited. In all existing studies, the characterization of the modules under consideration is reduced to the characterization of modules over some subalgebras of $\LL$. Depending on the structure of the original modules, these subalgebras -- and the corresponding modules -- have different natures some of which are already known, while others need to be studied separately. In this paper, we give a complete characterization of the modules over specific subalgebras $\gG$ of a twisted affine Lie superalgebra $\LL$ that arise in the study of general zero level simple finite weight $\LL$-modules. In particular, in the special case that $\gG=\LL,$ we obtain a complete characterization of quasi-integrable $\LL$-modules of level zero.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了扭曲仿射李超代数在临界水平（零级）下一般有限权模的完全分类问题，特别关注了在特定子代数上的模结构。
AI.motivation: 仿射李（超）代数的表示论在理论物理中有重要应用，但临界水平下一般模的研究仍然有限。现有研究通常将模的分类问题转化为对某些子代数上模的研究，但这些子代数和对应模的结构各不相同，有些已知，有些需要单独研究。
AI.method: 作者研究了扭曲仿射李超代数在零级情况下的一般有限权简单模，特别关注了在特定子代数gG上的模结构。当gG等于原代数L时，得到了拟可积L-模的完全分类。
AI.result: 给出了扭曲仿射李超代数特定子代数gG上模的完全分类，特别在gG=L的情况下，获得了零级拟可积L-模的完整特征描述。
AI.conclusion: 该研究填补了仿射李超代数在临界水平下一般模分类的空白，为相关表示论研究提供了重要的理论工具，特别是在零级拟可积模的完全分类方面取得了重要进展。

title: Explicit asymptotic expansions in p-adic harmonic analysis II
comment: 97 pages; Section 3 updated to reflect the issue in [34] discussed in [38]
summary: We unwind the induction implicit in the "one-step" asymptotic expansions of arXiv:1701.02417 to describe how to turn asymptotic expansions, such as (but not limited to) the Harish-Chandra--Howe local character expansion, for depth-(0) supercuspidal characters into Kim--Murnaghan-type asymptotic expansions for arbitrary positive-depth, tame, supercuspidal characters. Doing so requires analogous results for Fourier transforms of orbital integrals on the Lie algebra of a reductive group, which are of independent interest.

AI.tldr: 将深度为0的超尖特征标的渐近展开推广到任意正深度、驯服超尖特征标的Kim-Murnaghan型渐近展开
AI.motivation: 解决如何将深度为0的超尖特征标的渐近展开（如Harish-Chandra-Howe局部特征展开）推广到任意正深度、驯服超尖特征标的问题
AI.method: 展开arXiv:1701.02417中隐含的归纳法，将"一步"渐近展开转化为多步展开，同时需要李代数上轨道积分傅里叶变换的类似结果
AI.result: 建立了将深度0超尖特征标渐近展开转化为任意正深度、驯服超尖特征标Kim-Murnaghan型渐近展开的方法
AI.conclusion: 成功实现了超尖特征标渐近展开从深度0到任意正深度情况的推广，李代数上轨道积分傅里叶变换的结果也具有独立意义

title: Systematic Orbifold Constructions of Schellekens' Vertex Operator Algebras from Niemeier Lattices
comment: 42 pages, LaTeX; added a missing assumption in Proposition 2.2 and fixed a typo in Table 1
summary:
We present a systematic, rigorous construction of all 70 strongly rational, holomorphic vertex operator algebras $V$ of central charge 24 with non-zero weight-one space $V_1$ as cyclic orbifold constructions associated with the 24 Niemeier lattice vertex operator algebras $V_N$ and certain 226 short automorphisms in $\operatorname{Aut}(V_N)$.
  We show that up to algebraic conjugacy these automorphisms are exactly the generalised deep holes, as introduced in arXiv:1910.04947, of the Niemeier lattice vertex operator algebras with the additional property that their orders are equal to those of the corresponding outer automorphisms.
  Together with the constructions in arXiv:1708.05990 and arXiv:1910.04947 this gives three different uniform constructions of these vertex operator algebras, which are related through 11 algebraic conjugacy classes in $\operatorname{Co}_0$.
  Finally, by considering the inverse orbifold constructions associated with the 226 short automorphisms, we give the first systematic proof of the result that each strongly rational, holomorphic vertex operator algebra $V$ of central charge 24 with non-zero weight-one space $V_1$ is uniquely determined by the Lie algebra structure of $V_1$.

AI.tldr: 该论文系统构建了所有70个中心荷为24、具有非零权重1空间的强有理全纯顶点算子代数，通过尼迈尔格点顶点算子代数的循环轨道折叠构造实现。
AI.motivation: 研究中心荷为24的强有理全纯顶点算子代数的系统构造，特别是那些具有非零权重1空间的代数，以揭示其与尼迈尔格点顶点算子代数的深层联系。
AI.method: 使用24个尼迈尔格点顶点算子代数和226个短自同构的循环轨道折叠构造，证明这些自同构恰好是广义深洞，且其阶数等于对应外自同构的阶数。
AI.result: 成功系统构建了所有70个目标顶点算子代数，提供了三种统一的构造方法，并通过逆轨道折叠构造首次系统证明了V1的李代数结构唯一确定整个顶点算子代数。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为理解中心荷24的强有理全纯顶点算子代数提供了完整的构造框架，建立了尼迈尔格点顶点算子代数与这些代数之间的深刻对应关系，并证明了权重1空间的李代数结构具有决定性作用。
